backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Game catalog with CRUD operations: add, retrieve (all, by category, by title, most popular), increment play count, and delete games, stored in a Map keyed by title.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature request to visually differentiate each SoundpadPage button with unique icons, accent colors, and styles reflecting its sound, while retaining the neon arcade theme.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, page, hook, and utility in the project for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, card, border, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Random Arcade app, loading Exo 2 and Chakra Petch Google Fonts and mounting the React app via /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router and React Query setup defining root layout with Navigation/Footer, and routes for HomePage (/), GamePage (/game/$title), and SoundpadPage (/soundpad).
frontend/src/components/FeaturedGameHero: Hero banner component displaying a featured game's thumbnail, title, description, play count, category badge, and a neon orange Play Now button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing the Random Arcade brand, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Game card component rendering a thumbnail, title, category badge, and play count with category-specific neon color theming and a hover play button overlay.
frontend/src/components/games/AmongUsGam: Empty file with no content; likely a placeholder for an Among Us mini-game component.
frontend/src/components/games/AsteroidsG: A canvas-based Asteroids game component with ship movement, bullet firing, asteroid splitting, collision detection, and sound effects via useSoundEffect hook.
frontend/src/components/games/DinoRunner: A canvas-based endless runner game where a dinosaur jumps over procedurally spawned cacti, with increasing speed, score milestones, and sound effects.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryMatc: A React-based memory card matching game with 8 emoji symbol pairs, move counter, elapsed timer, and win detection.
frontend/src/components/games/Minesweepe: A 9x9 Minesweeper game with mine placement on first click, flood-fill reveal, flagging, win/loss detection, and an elapsed timer.
frontend/src/components/games/PongGame.t: A canvas-based two-player Pong game with keyboard controls, angle-based paddle deflection, score tracking up to 7, and sound effects.
frontend/src/components/games/RetroBowlG: A full-featured retro-style American football game rendered on an HTML5 canvas, implementing game phases, player/defender AI, passing, running, field goals, scoring, and HUD display.
frontend/src/components/games/SixSevenGa: Empty file with no content or implementation.
Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/SpaceInvad: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/SwordsAndS: A turn-based gladiator combat game rendered on a canvas where the player chooses attack, block, or special actions against an AI enemy, with shake/flash animations and sound effects.
frontend/src/components/games/TetrisGame: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/TungTungGa: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/WhackAMole: A 30-second whack-a-mole game with a 9-hole grid where moles randomly appear and disappear, tracking score and using sound effects for pops, whacks, and game over.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with the Random Arcade logo/brand and links to the Game Library (/) and Soundpad (/soundpad) routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching games (all, by category, most popular), incrementing play counts, and adding new games via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundEffect.ts: A React hook that wraps the Web Audio API to provide reusable sound primitives (tones, sweeps, noise bursts) and higher-level retro game sound effects like pass throws, touchdowns, and tackles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines CSS custom properties for a dark neon-themed design system, and provides utility classes for neon text/glow effects, scanlines, and custom fonts.
frontend/src/lib/seedGames.ts: Defines a static list of seed game entries and exports a function that checks existing games and adds any missing ones to the backend via provided actor methods.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: A route page that maps URL title parameters to specific game components, increments the play count on mount, and renders the matched game or a 404 state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main landing page that seeds initial games on load, displays a featured game hero, category filter buttons, and a grid of game cards with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/SoundpadPage.tsx: An interactive soundboard page that renders a grid of styled buttons, each triggering a specific sound effect from the useSoundEffect hook with visual active-state feedback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom fonts (Chakra Petch, Exo 2), neon color palette, oklch-based semantic colors, neon box shadows, and keyframe animations like neon-pulse and float.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 45) describing Random Arcade, a web-based gaming platform with 17+ browser games, recording existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and a new soundpad sub-project.
